title: If Alibaba owns WeChat, will it get banned in the U.S. app store in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am not exactly sure if Alibaba will be banned but beginning Sunday, WeChat and TikTok will no longer be a downloadable app starting Sunday. (Actually I had downloaded TikTok when it first came out and tried to reload it from the cloud and it wouldn’t as of today, Friday, September 18, 2020). Those that currently use TikTok should still be able to use the app, however potential new users will not be able to download the starting Sunday. Since Oracle is buying TikTok, that app will be downloadable once they take the reins over from China. I am not sure at this point about WeChat (or Alibaba). U.S. to start blocking TikTok and WeChat downloads Sunday
